Ice Rao

Thanks For showing interest to check about me, i’m Ice Rao. I cook delicious code library for fun. I’m a Born programmer, computer lover, romantic novel reader, like to play dance machine! curious towards css3,html5,nodejs,ES6,sql,and so on.This is my personal blog. It currently has 27 posts in 17 categories which combinedly have 10606 words, which will take an average reader ( WPM) approximately 53.03 minutes to read. The most recent post is "微信小程序开发注意指南和优化实践" which was published on 18 Jun 2019. The last commit was on Wednesday, 19 Jun 2019 at 02:37 PM UTC.

前端妹子一枚，我平时比较繁忙（正业：打杂、犯花痴、偷窥帅锅，副业：码农、前端）,所以知识点有些可能会有问题，看不过眼（强迫症的请重视我的后面一句），欢迎小伙伴们帮忙评论修改。

非常欢迎各位研发大佬们加入上海京东团队，有意向可以投简历到邮箱raoenhui@jd.com中，TKS。
